name: Isola #1
description:
Isola is iconic heritage building in North Bandung. This building was designed by famous architect in colonial era, Wolff Schoemaker. At the begining, this building was built for Dominique Willem Berretty's house. Now it serves as headmastership office of Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia.
For me, Isola always bring back college life memories. I often to spend my time around Isola, Parter when I was freshmen, and Barrety when I tried to finish my study. In this project, I try to capture Isola from several angle.
